items.text: Elephants are the biggest land animals on Earth, towering over most other creatures!
There are three types of elephants: the mighty African bush elephant, the shy African forest elephant, and the gentle Asian elephant.
With their long trunks, elephants can pick up food, drink water, and even give each other a friendly hug!
